pubsub.io.processing
Class WebSocket

java.lang.Object
  pubsub.io.processing.WebSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class WebSocket
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

The WebSocket is an implementation of WebSocket Client API, and expects a valid "ws://" URI to connect to. When connected, an instance recieves important events related to the life of the connection, like onOpen, onClose, onError and onMessage. An instance can send messages to the server via the send method.

Author:
Animesh Kumar
